Method Detail

digestToString

public static java.lang.String digestToString(byte[] digest)
get a string value of a digest as a hex list, two characters per byte. There would seem to be a more efficient implementation of this involving a 256 byte memory buffer.

Parameters:
digest - checksum
Returns:
hex equivalent

patchProject

public static java.lang.String patchProject(java.lang.String projectName)
Convert a dotted project name into a forward slashed project name. This is done in preparation for Maven2 repositories, which will have more depth to their classes. NB: only public for testing. This is not a public API.

Parameters:
projectName - the project name
Returns:
a string whch may or may not match the old string.

nonEmpty

public static boolean nonEmpty(java.lang.String s)
test that a string is not empty

Parameters:
s -
Returns:
true iff the string is non null, and not ""

createMavenArtifactName

public static java.lang.String createMavenArtifactName(SerializedArtifact library)
                                                throws SmartFrogRuntimeException
Create an artifact filename. This claims to be maven1, but really it is also maven2, as if there is a classifier, we use that as well. There just near zero chance of that finding a match against the classic M1 repository.

Parameters:
library -
Returns:
the filename of an artifact using maven separation rules
Throws:
SmartFrogRuntimeException - on validity errors

createIvyArtifactFilename

public static java.lang.String createIvyArtifactFilename(SerializedArtifact artifact,
                                                         boolean versioned)
Create an ivy artifact

Parameters:
artifact - the artifact
versioned - a flag to set to being true if the artifact should be versioned
Returns:
the filename

createIvyArtifactCacheFilename

public static java.lang.String createIvyArtifactCacheFilename(SerializedArtifact artifact)
Create an ivy filename from an artifact. This is the layout in the cache

Parameters:
artifact - the artifact to convert
Returns:
a filename of the form name-version.extension

createIvyArtifactPublishedFilename

public static java.lang.String createIvyArtifactPublishedFilename(SerializedArtifact artifact)
Create an ivy published filename from an artifact. This does not include the version marker, as that is expected to be encoded in a parent directory.

Parameters:
artifact - the artifact to convert
Returns:
a filename of the form name-version.extension

convertProjectToIvyFormat

public static java.lang.String convertProjectToIvyFormat(SerializedArtifact artifact)
Conver the project to the ivy format. This currently returns the project, as is.

Parameters:
artifact - the artifact to convert
Returns:
the project of an artifact
